name: Literal Dungeon Crawler
description:
A 3D realtime dungeon crawler. Collect all 7 of the gems/keys to escape!

This game was made for Miz Jam 1 in under 48 (non-consecutive) hours!

Assets that deserve credits:

Scary Ambiance Sound - Mike Koenighttp://soundbible.com/1756-Scary-Ambiance.htmlApprehensive Sound - Mike Koenighttp://soundbible.com/1838-Apprehensive.htmlStrange Days Sound - Mike Koenighttp://soundbible.com/1741-Strange-Days.htmlTension and Chase! - Disturbed Horror Loop - JessKawaiiXxXhttps://freesound.org/people/JessKawaiiXxX/sounds/421606/headache.mp3 - Taira Komorihttps://freesound.org/people/Taira%20Komori/sounds/216913/Shaky breaths - frightened scared young lady girl teenager.wav - AderuMorohttps://freesound.org/people/AderuMoro/sounds/213293/Female Running Scared - AmeAngelofSinhttps://freesound.org/people/AmeAngelofSin/sounds/350313/Dungeon Air - Flamifferhttps://freesound.org/people/Flamiffer/sounds/530161/fire_small_loop.wav - PhreaKsAccounthttps://freesound.org/people/PhreaKsAccount/sounds/46273/

Special thanks to AppleJacks for playtesting my game!
